tr.td: Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

div.p: Group 3 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionStatus|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Packversion: 5.2.0)

tr.td: Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.focus` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.focus` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.additionalContext` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.additionalContext` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `SubscriptionStatus.subscription` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `SubscriptionStatus.subscription` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `SubscriptionStatus.topic` with an unmapped Canonical type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-canonical`. Element `SubscriptionStatus.topic` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 SubscriptionStatus to FHIR R4 Basic

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 SubscriptionStatus to FHIR R4.

comment.value: Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.

Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained`, use that element instead. Element `SubscriptionStatus.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.
Element `SubscriptionStatus.status` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `SubscriptionStatus` is not mapped.
